name: bootstrap-textures
description: Easily apply textures to Bootstrap 4 elements

scripts.css-minify: node-sass --output-style compressed --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/ -o dist/
scripts.build: npm run css && cp ./node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css* docs/ && cp ./node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js* docs/ && cp -r dist/* docs/

author: TheNewSound <thenewsound@worldwidecrap.nl> (https://worldwidecrap.nl/)
